positions.subtitle: State Bank of India
positions.description: I worked as Dy General Manager (Business & Operations) Delhi Zonal Office , State Bank of India as Zone Head for 2 years and 9 months . I was handling total business of Rs 50000 crores distributed over 200 branches and 9 CPCs functioning under my control.I subsequently moved to another position as Dy General Manager & Circle Credit Officer , Delhi Circle . The job responsibilities include maintenance of Assets of Rs 58000 crores under SME , Retail and Agriculture segment , NPA management , Restructuring and resolution of stressed assets.I am Member Secretary of Credit Committees for sanction of loans upto Rs 500.00 crs.I entered SBI as a Probationary Officer in 1980 and has a rich experience of 35 years with SBI.
positions.title: Dy General Manager
positions.description_html:
I worked as Dy General Manager (Business & Operations) Delhi Zonal Office , State Bank of India as Zone Head for 2 years and 9 months . I was handling total business of Rs 50000 crores distributed over 200 branches and 9 CPCs functioning under my control.I subsequently moved to another position as Dy General Manager & Circle Credit Officer , Delhi Circle . The job responsibilities include maintenance of Assets of Rs 58000 crores under SME , Retail and Agriculture segment , NPA management , Restructuring and resolution of stressed assets.I am Member Secretary of Credit Committees for sanction of loans upto Rs 500.00 crs.
I entered SBI as a Probationary Officer in 1980 and has a rich experience of 35 years with SBI.

detailed_profile.name: Sanoj Thayyil Ramakrishnan
detailed_profile.position: General Manager HR @ The Muthoot Group | Executive in Strategic Performance Management
detailed_profile.about: As the General Manager HR at The Muthoot Group, I lead the HR strategy and operations for a diversified financial services conglomerate with over 20,000 employees and 5,000 branches across India and abroad. With over 10 years of senior HR experience, I have developed core competencies in HRBP, P&L, and HR Transformation, and have successfully delivered multiple HR projects and initiatives that have enhanced the business performance and employee engagement. I hold a master's degree in HR from XLRI Jamshedpur, one of the top business schools in India, and another master's degree in marketing from MP Bhoj Open University. My field of expertise is in aligning the HR vision with the business goals, creating a positive and inclusive work culture, and optimizing the HR processes and systems. My mission is to enable the growth and success of The Muthoot Group and its people through effective and innovative HR solutions.

experience.title: Asst Branch Manager
experience.description: Job Responsibility include:-•	Knowledge about the working of the Branch i.e. computer system, appraisal of Gold, opening and closing of A/c’s, working of cash Dept., Strong Room operations and working of CRM software etc.•	Fully aware of the details of work allocation to each staff in the branch•	Check the data collected by Office Boy by distributing Bit Notices and also see whether the data is fed in CRM by CCE after follow up. •	Monitoring of CCE work;  see the data in CRM, new data fed in the CRM and follow up done by CCE.•	Verify the follow up from Register/ Records maintained by CCE. •	Visit HNI Customers every day and minimum 20 in a week. 2 HNI visits for new prospective customers and 2 for inactive customers.•	Read IOM & Circulars issued by Higher Authorities and follow the instructions contained therein and also share and explain to all the Staff in the Branch for proper implementation. •	Should take the support of Marketing & Sales for conducting activities in the catchment area.
experience.description_html:
Job Responsibility include:-
• Knowledge about the working of the Branch i.e. computer system, appraisal of Gold, opening and closing of A/c’s, working of cash Dept., Strong Room operations and working of CRM software etc.
• Fully aware of the details of work allocation to each staff in the branch
• Check the data collected by Office Boy by distributing Bit Notices and also see whether the data is fed in CRM by CCE after follow up.
• Monitoring of CCE work; see the data in CRM, new data fed in the CRM and follow up done by CCE.
• Verify the follow up from Register/ Records maintained by CCE.
• Visit HNI Customers every day and minimum 20 in a week. 2 HNI visits for new prospective customers and 2 for inactive customers.
• Read IOM & Circulars issued by Higher Authorities and follow the instructions contained therein and also share and explain to all the Staff in the Branch for proper implementation.
• Should take the support of Marketing & Sales for conducting activities in the catchment area.

positions.description: o Management of Lead Data for entire 29 regions across India (except South) comprising of 1800+ brancheso Generating reports & publishing dashboards for the leads generated from various marketing campaigns (frequency: Daily, weekly & monthly)o Distributing Marketing Budget to all 29 regions on Quarterly basis & tracking their performance (i.e. ROI)o Developing Marketing Calendar for the respective sub-regions in concurrence to brand projection and image buildingo Management (coordination & negotiations) of agencies & vendors for various marketing campaigns such as Wall Prints, Hoardings, Newspaper inserts, Media Advertisements i.e. Television, Radio, etc.o Tracking the performance of 2 outsourced Call Centres (Gold Loan and Credit) to increase the business generation. Also, publishing the Dashboard to the managemento Regular up-keeping of Calling Management System (CMS) for the smooth executing of Inbound & Outbound calls between branches & customers
positions.title: Assistant Manager
positions.description_html:
o Management of Lead Data for entire 29 regions across India (except South)
comprising of 1800+ branches
o Generating reports & publishing dashboards for the leads generated from various
marketing campaigns (frequency: Daily, weekly & monthly)
o Distributing Marketing Budget to all 29 regions on Quarterly basis & tracking their
performance (i.e. ROI)
o Developing Marketing Calendar for the respective sub-regions in concurrence to
brand projection and image building
o Management (coordination & negotiations) of agencies & vendors for various
marketing campaigns such as Wall Prints, Hoardings, Newspaper inserts, Media
Advertisements i.e. Television, Radio, etc.
o Tracking the performance of 2 outsourced Call Centres (Gold Loan and Credit) to
increase the business generation. Also, publishing the Dashboard to the management
o Regular up-keeping of Calling Management System (CMS) for the smooth executing
of Inbound & Outbound calls between branches & customers

2. Handle branch operations and work along with branch team to achieve branch set targets month on month
3. Track inflow and outflow of gold loan report

5. Prepare financial statements for the head office and monitor expenses of the branch
6. Help to maintain all relevant company databases and updates.

basic_info.name: Ronnie Lynn - Vice President at Muthoot Finance Ltd. - India
basic_info.search_snippet: Vice President at Muthoot Finance Ltd. - India · As a highly experienced and results-oriented IT leader in the financial services industry, I have over 20 ...

detailed_profile.name: Ronnie Lynn
detailed_profile.position: Vice President at Muthoot Finance Ltd. - India
detailed_profile.about: As a highly experienced and results-oriented IT leader in the financial services industry, I have over 20 years of experience in delivering technology solutions from concept to delivery. I'm a hands-on technology leader with a proven record of aligning technology with business goals. I specialize in navigating the complexities of Investments and Capital Markets technologies and the business processes. I'm passionate about and recognized for leading, collaborating and creating high-performance teams to deliver technology solutions, on time and within budget. My focus is on implementing transformative solutions for front-to-back critical systems that span Trading Platforms, Risk Management, Back-office, Treasury, Legal, Compliance and Financial Reporting. I have a deep understanding of technology and business processes for the entire lifecycle of financial products across various asset sectors, from intricacies of derivatives trading, fixed income assets and private capital. People, Process, and Technology – I believe the right interplay of these is how you drive and achieve organizational success. I’m passionate about empowering people, building high-performing teams, and fostering environments where collaboration, open communication, and a focused approach lead to innovation and achieve meaningful outcomes for the stakeholders. Trust, empathy and resiliency are my guiding stars and are central to how I build strong relationships across the organization and lead technology transformations. Navigating diverse perspectives and disparate viewpoints to achieve organizational goals has always been front and center for me throughout my career. I have relied on these core principles to tackle complex problems and deliver effective outcomes.

experience.title: Vice President
experience.description: • Spearheaded the separation of technologies platform for Capital Markets and Investments for spin-off of    Corebridge from AIG achieving full disentanglement of technology platforms, data, network and storage    under extremely tight deadlines and within budget.• Led the transformation of the technology platforms to utilize a hybrid model for Investment management    with some asset classes managed internally, while leveraging third-party manager-of-managers model    for certain asset classes in partnership with external partners, Blackstone and BlackRock • Provide leadership for strategic direction, architecture, development, and operational support of    technology portfolio used for managing the entire life cycle of Derivatives and across the fixed income    spectrum that include public, private and real estate asset classes
experience.description_html:
• Spearheaded the separation of technologies platform for Capital Markets and Investments for spin-off of
Corebridge from AIG achieving full disentanglement of technology platforms, data, network and storage
under extremely tight deadlines and within budget.

• Led the transformation of the technology platforms to utilize a hybrid model for Investment management
with some asset classes managed internally, while leveraging third-party manager-of-managers model
for certain asset classes in partnership with external partners, Blackstone and BlackRock

• Provide leadership for strategic direction, architecture, development, and operational support of
technology portfolio used for managing the entire life cycle of Derivatives and across the fixed income
spectrum that include public, private and real estate asset classes

detailed_profile.name: Rajiv Kohli
detailed_profile.position: ZONAL MANAGER (NORTH) AT MUTHOOT FINANCE LTD INDIA
detailed_profile.about: A professional banker with 35 years of operational experience at various positions including branch operations,Regional office, zonal offices,Head offices and corporate centre in different geographies across India including Mumbai and NCR Delhi. Positions Held : 1.GENERAL MANAGER 3 YEARS 2.DEPUTY GENERAL MANAGER 6 YEARS 3.REGIONAL MANAGER 6 YEARS 4.BRANCH OPERATIONS 12 YEARS * Vast experience in overall administration. H.R. ,Growth of assets & liabilities portfolio and ensuring quality of advances. *Specialization in driving marketing teams for sourcing and timely sanction of Home loans, Car loans, Personal loans and MSME business. *Possess vast experience in developing liaison with Builders, Car dealers, CREDAI, RERA, NAREDCO, NHB, HUDCO GOVT functionaries, corporates etc. *Vast expertise in monitoring Branch operations,Central processing cells functioning. *Vast exposure in handling premier segment customers,and promotion of NRI business, *Expertise in marketing and devising strategies for sale of cross selling products i.e. Life insurance, General insurance, Mutual funds, Credit cards etc. *Excellent exposure in resolution of stressed assets, maintaining quality of credit portfolio, Restructuring and entering compromises etc .

basic_info.name: Bennuri Gopal Krishna Shivaram
basic_info.search_snippet: As the National Sales Head at Muthoot Finance Limited, I am driving the expansion of direct open-market small business loan customer acquisition.

detailed_profile.name: Bennuri Gopal Krishna Shivaram
detailed_profile.position: National Sales Manager @ Muthoot Finance Limited | Customer Acquisition, Sales Growth, Direct Channel
detailed_profile.about: National Sales Head | Muthoot Finance Limited | Scaling Small Business Lending & Cross-Sell Growth As the National Sales Head at Muthoot Finance Limited, I am driving the expansion of direct open-market small business loan customer acquisition while augmenting cross-sell opportunities across India. My focus is on building a robust sales team and distribution network, identifying Total Addressable Market (TAM), and enhancing contact center capabilities for deeper market penetration. With a strategic approach to new product development and portfolio quality management, I ensure sustainable growth in the retail small-ticket loan segment. Key Expertise: ✔ Scaling direct open-market customer acquisition ✔ Strengthening cross-sell and upsell strategies ✔ Expanding sales teams & distribution networks ✔ Driving digital and contact center capabilities ✔ Developing new financial products ✔ Managing portfolio quality & risk metrics Having led high-impact sales teams at IDFC FIRST Bank and Aditya Birla Finance Limited in the past, I bring a wealth of experience in personal loans, unsecured small-ticket loans, and digital finance solutions. My expertise in open-market acquisitions and tech-driven lending solutions has consistently delivered high-growth outcomes. Always open to networking and discussing new opportunities in the financial services sector. Let’s connect!

detailed_profile.name: Lt Col Vikrant Kumar
detailed_profile.position: Regional Manager - Muthoot Finance Ltd
detailed_profile.about: The Muthoot Group,is the largest financial group of its kind in the country.Established in 1887,the group is today, a well diversified, value based corporate house with an unblemished track record spanning several decades. The Group has interests in 16 diverse businesses including Banking & Financing, Leasing & Hire Purchase, Money Transfer, Foreign Exchange, Insurance, Information Technology, Hotel & Hospitality, Education & Healthcare, Media, Power Generation, to name a few. The group is an equal opportunity employer and acknowledges excellent performance, loyalty and sincerity by way of fast track growth. Indian Army : A competent & dynamic professional with 18 yrs of extensive experience in HR Management, General Administration and Security Initiatives. Last associated with Indian Army as Senior Management Officer (Lieutenant Colonel). Experience in managing HR Systems with deftness in maintaining harmonious relations among management & workers through efficient administration and resolution of employees’ grievances. A strategic planner with extensive experience in managing operations of large armed groups with demonstrated leadership qualities & organisational skills during the tenure. Successfully developed beneficial relationship with Government Departments & Regulatory Authorities. An effective communicator with exceptional interpersonal skills and hands on experience in training and development of subordinates.

experience.title: Regional Manager
experience.description: Regional Manager - Delhi East : Muthoot Finance Ltd.To monitor & Oversee the development of business in about 70+ branches in  Delhi East Region / NCR / Uttar Pradesh.Responsible for ensuring the achievement of target for all the branches for all the different products offered by the Group such as Gold Loan, Gold Bond,Gold Coin, Forex, Insurance, Money Transfer, Air Travel etc.Involved in the branch expansion process to ensure that branches are opened in high potential area to get the maximum business.Responsible for maintaining good HR practices and high level of Morality in tune with the ethics & values of Muthoot Group.
experience.description_html:
Regional Manager - Delhi East : Muthoot Finance Ltd.

To monitor & Oversee the development of business in about 70+ branches in Delhi East Region / NCR / Uttar Pradesh.

Responsible for ensuring the achievement of target for all the branches for all the different products offered by the Group such as Gold Loan, Gold Bond,Gold Coin, Forex, Insurance, Money Transfer, Air Travel etc.

Involved in the branch expansion process to ensure that branches are opened in high potential area to get the maximum business.

Responsible for maintaining good HR practices and high level of Morality in tune with the ethics & values of Muthoot Group.

experience.title: Lt Col
experience.description: MANAGEMENT / ADMINISTRATION EXPERTISEIdentifying corporate objectives, planning, organizing needed resources, directing, controlling and coordinating efforts to achieve results.Calling and organising meetings at the high level of management for best coordination of efforts.Attending and participating in meetings, seminars and conferences in order to look for newer opportunities for higher and faster growth. Enforcing, tracking and ensuring compliance with all organization policies and procedures. OPERATIONS MANAGEMENTDirecting the development and implementation of Key Operational Strategies.Demonstrated effectiveness in problem evaluation with ability to generate & implement effective solutions. Troubleshooting operational functions to ensure productivity and optimize quality. Developing & administering Annual Budgets, Cost Containments, Purchasing and Inventory Control operations. Planning and organising high level events for Dignitaries, VIPs including security cover etc.HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENTResponsible for team building and providing effective leadership to realize the potential of every member of the organisation for delivering quantifiable results.Inculcated a positive spirit and provided a conducive working environment.Co-ordinated with other functional departments for devising HR Policies and implemented the same for career development and welfare of the employees.Implemented various policies to minimize manpower attrition rate.
experience.description_html:
MANAGEMENT / ADMINISTRATION EXPERTISE
Identifying corporate objectives, planning, organizing needed resources, directing, controlling and coordinating efforts to achieve results.
Calling and organising meetings at the high level of management for best coordination of efforts.
Attending and participating in meetings, seminars and conferences in order to look for newer opportunities for higher and faster growth.
Enforcing, tracking and ensuring compliance with all organization policies and procedures.

OPERATIONS MANAGEMENT
Directing the development and implementation of Key Operational Strategies.
Demonstrated effectiveness in problem evaluation with ability to generate & implement effective solutions.
Troubleshooting operational functions to ensure productivity and optimize quality.
Developing & administering Annual Budgets, Cost Containments, Purchasing and Inventory Control operations.
Planning and organising high level events for Dignitaries, VIPs including security cover etc.

HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENT
Responsible for team building and providing effective leadership to realize the potential of every member of the organisation for delivering quantifiable results.
Inculcated a positive spirit and provided a conducive working environment.
Co-ordinated with other functional departments for devising HR Policies and implemented the same for career development and welfare of the employees.
Implemented various policies to minimize manpower attrition rate.
